mapper.select: select hts.tag,hts.createddate, hts.modifieddate,hts.createduser,hts.modifieduser, hts.activeflag from helptags hts where hts.activeflag is true and hts.id=#{id}
select hts.id, hts.tag,hts.createddate, hts.modifieddate,hts.createduser,hts.modifieduser, hts.activeflag from helptags hts where hts.activeflag is true and hts.tag ilike #{tag, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select hts.id, hts.tag,hts.createddate, hts.modifieddate,hts.createduser,hts.modifieduser, hts.activeflag from helptags hts where hts.activeflag is true and hts.tag = #{tag, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ht.id, ht.tag,ht.createddate, ht.modifieddate,ht.createduser,ht.modifieduser, ht.activeflag from helptags ht inner join helpcontenttags hct on hct.helptagid= ht.id and hct.activeflag is true and ht.activeflag is true where hct.activeflag is true and hct.helpcontentid = #{contentId}
